16 def from_s(idx, a):
17  """ Returns x and y coordinates of the indexed item in a square with length a """
18  x = int(idx/a)
19  y = idx%a
20  return x, y
21 
22 def bringToSameLength(list1, list2):
23  """ Matches length of two lists. If one is shorter than the other, it will be extended with the contents of the other array """
24  #https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29972836/numpy-how-to-resize-an-random-array-using-another-array-as-template
25  if len(list1) < len(list2):
26  list1[len(list1):len(list2)]=list2[len(list1):]
27  elif len(list2) < len(list1):
28  list2[len(list2):len(list1)]=list1[len(list2):]
29  return list1, list2
30 
31 class bulletInstance:
32  """!@brief Manages workers and instantiates bullet simulation """
33  def __init__(self, realtime=False, ts=None, spawnGroundplane=False) -> None:
34  # Register physics client
35  self.physicsClient = p.connect(p.SHARED_MEMORY)
36  #
37  # Set up search path for urdf's to be found
38  p.setAdditionalSearchPath(pybullet_data.getDataPath())
39  #
40  # Set gravity and load groundplane
41  p.setGravity(0,0,-9.8)
42  if spawnGroundplane == True:
43  planeId = p.loadURDF("plane.urdf")
44  #
45  p.setTimeStep(ts)
46  #
47  # Keep track of spawned robots and their id's
48  self.activeModels = []
49  #
50  # Keep track of which envs are ready for a sim step
51  self.readyEnvs = None
52  #
53  def __del__(self):
54  """ Class Destructor """
55  p.disconnect()
56  #
57  def addUrdf(self, name, pos=[0,0,0], path=None, note=None):
58  """ Loads URDF into pybullet sim. If path is set, it will be used as the search path """
59  if path != None: p.setAdditionalSearchPath(path)
60  robotId = p.loadURDF(name, basePosition=pos)
61  self.activeModels.append([note, name, robotId])
62  # Wait for model to be loaded
63  time.sleep(1)
64  return robotId
65  #
66  def createJoints(self, simParams):
67  """ Creates simulation environment based on simParams """
68  joints = []
69  # Iterate over robots
70  for r in range(simParams["NumRobots"]):
71  # Get base position
72  x, y = from_s(r, simParams["StationsPerCol"])
73  # Add URDF
74  robotId = self.addUrdf(
75  simParams["URDFName"],
76  pos = [
77  x*simParams["StationSize"][0],
78  y*simParams["StationSize"][1],
79  0
80  ],
81  path = simParams["URDFPath"]
82  )
83  # Iterate over joints of each robot
84  for j in range(simParams["JointsPerRobot"]):
85  segmentId = simParams["IdsWithinRobot"][j]
86  # Store joint info
87  joints.append(
88  [
89  robotId,
90  segmentId
91  ]
92  )
93  # Set physics properties
94  p.changeDynamics(
95  robotId,
96  segmentId,
97  linearDamping = simParams["JointLinearDamping"][j],
98  angularDamping = simParams["JointAngularDamping"][j]
99  )
100  # When the loop is done, return joint info to be stored in rosparam
101  return joints
102  #
103  def update(self, readyArr):
104  """ Checks which envs are ready for a sim step. If all are ready, a step is called """
105  # Update which envs were marked as ready in message
106  if self.readyEnvs != None:
107  readyArr, self.readyEnvs = bringToSameLength(readyArr, self.readyEnvs)
108  readyEnvs = [
109  a or b
110  for a, b in zip(readyArr, self.readyEnvs)
111  ]
112  else:
113  readyEnvs = readyArr
114  # Check if all envs are ready
115  if all(readyEnvs):
116  # If they are, step simulation and reset the variable
117  p.stepSimulation()
118  self.readyEnvs = [ False for _ in readyEnvs ]
119  return 1
120  else:
121  # Otherwise, update class member
122  self.readyEnvs = readyEnvs
123  return 0
124 
125 class ROSWrapper:
126  """!@brief Wraps physics simulation helper class to the ROS param and msg services """
127  def __init__(self) -> None:
128  # Load jointcontrol params from rospy
129  assert rospy.has_param("/jointcontrol")
130  params = rospy.get_param("/jointcontrol")
131  self.NumJoints = params["NumJoints"]
132  #
133  # Instantiate bullet instance
134  self.sim = bulletInstance(
135  realtime = params["SimParams"]["Realtime"],
136  ts = params["SimParams"]["Ts"]
137  )
138  # Create joints and store joint info in rosparam server
139  joints = self.sim.createJoints(params["SimParams"])
140  for idx, j in enumerate(joints):
141  rospy.set_param(
142  "/jointcontrol/J{}/RobotID".format(idx), j[0]
143  )
144  rospy.set_param(
145  "/jointcontrol/J{}/SegmentID".format(idx), j[1]
146  )
147  # Subscribe to synchronisation message and check in callback whether or not to perform a simulation step
148  rospy.init_node("BulletSimServer")
149  self.syncSub = rospy.Subscriber("jointcontrol/envSync", jointMetric, self.syncCallback)
150  # Register publisher to the synchronisation message
151  self.syncPub = rospy.Publisher("jointcontrol/globalEnvSync", jointMetric, queue_size = 1)
152  # Wait for everything to register
153  time.sleep(2)
154  #
155  def syncCallback(self, data):
156  """ Callback for synchronisation messages """
157  # Check return value of the simulation update
158  if self.sim.update(data.ready):
159  # If update was perfored, publish the synchronisation message in order to signal to the envs that the sim step is ready
160  self.syncPub.publish(
161  jointMetric( [ False for _ in data.ready ] )
162  )
163 
164 if __name__ == "__main__":
165  wrap = ROSWrapper()
166  rospy.spin()
167
